summary: Breaking Benjamin is an American rock band from Pennsylvania, formed in 1999 by Benjamin Burnley and Jeremy Hummel. They released four albums before taking a break in 2010 due to Burnley's health issues. During this time, there were legal problems, leading to member changes. The band returned in 2014 with a new lineup and released two more successful albums. Their music style stays the same, with hard rock sounds and emotional lyrics. They've sold millions of records and received many awards in the U.S.
title: Breaking Benjamin
